parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: The member ID. You must specify only one of the following parameters: UserId and MemberId.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You can call [ListWorkspaceUsers](~~449133~~) to obtain the ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You must specify only one of the following parameters: UserId and MemberId.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
